subject: Move jest.setup.ts from create-only to copy-overwrite (expo)
description:
Delete expo/create-only/jest.setup.ts and create expo/copy-overwrite/jest.setup.ts with base-only mocks. Add import "./jest.setup.local" side-effect import. Remove project-specific mocks (@/lib/env, firebase). Keep: RTLRN pure import, extend-expect, __unhandledRejectionHandler type, React 19 cleanup, ResizeObserver, expo-router mock, clearAllMocks, afterAll handler removal.

**Verification:** `ls expo/copy-overwrite/jest.setup.ts && ! ls expo/create-only/jest.setup.ts`

verification.expected: file exists in copy-overwrite, not in create-only
